properties.name: spring.modulith.default-async-termination
properties.description: Whether to configure defaults for the async processing termination, namely to wait for task completion for 2 seconds. See TaskExecutionProperties for details.

properties.name: spring.modulith.republish-outstanding-events-on-restart
properties.description: Whether to republish outstanding event publications on restarts of the application.

deprecation.reason: Moved to spring.modulith.events namespace. To be removed in 1.4.

properties.name: spring.modulith.events.republish-outstanding-events-on-restart
properties.description: Whether to republish outstanding event publications on restarts of the application.

properties.name: spring.modulith.events.staleness.check-intervall
properties.description: Configures the {@link Duration} to check for stale event publications. Defaults to one minute.

properties.name: spring.modulith.events.staleness.processing
properties.description: Configures after which {@link Duration} an {@link org.springframework.modulith.events.EventPublication} marked as {@value org.springframework.modulith.events.EventPublication.Status#PROCESSING} will be considered stale.

properties.name: spring.modulith.events.staleness.published
properties.description: Configures after which {@link Duration} an {@link org.springframework.modulith.events.EventPublication} marked as {@value org.springframework.modulith.events.EventPublication.Status#PUBLISHED} will be considered stale.

properties.name: spring.modulith.events.staleness.resubmission
properties.description: Configures after which {@link Duration} an {@link org.springframework.modulith.events.EventPublication} marked as {@value org.springframework.modulith.events.EventPublication.Status#RESUBMITTED} will be considered stale.
